title: Sign up
subtitle: To get started, help us understand your main reason for joining our application.

contributor.title: Contributor
contributor.subtitle: You want to discover open source projects, join exciting initiatives, and help them grow.

maintainer.title: Maintainer
maintainer.subtitle: You are the creator or maintainer of an open source project and are looking for qualified contributors to join your team.

sponsor.title: Sponsor
sponsor.subtitle: You represent an organization or foundation and want to support and accelerate open source projects through various programs.
